DEBATE-SPEECH.TEXT: The next item is the report ( A6-0310/2005 ) by Mrs De Veyrac, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on the proposal for a regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council on the information to air transport passengers on the identity of the operating carrier and on communication of safety information by Member States ( COM(2005)0048 – C6-0046/2005 – 2005/0008(COD) ).
